text: Jason Statham net worth and salary : Jason Statham is a British actor who has a net worth of $ 70 million. Before becoming a world - famous action star, Jason Statham originally pursued a career in diving and was a member of Britain's National Diving Squad for twelve years. An agent spotted him in 1998 and his career in front of the camera took off almost instantly. His dozens of films have grossed more than $ 1 billion dollars at the worldwide box office.
